channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 丰田公司正在重新评估其对全电动汽车的有限需求。在过去的十年中，丰田一直是汽车行业混合动力汽车最响亮的拥护者，而现在，电动汽车市场正在倾听丰田的声音：
item.description:
Toyota’s stance on limited appetite for fully electric vehicles is being reassessed. ⁠
⁠
After spending the past decade as the car industry’s loudest champions of hybrid vehicles, the electric vehicle market is now listening: https://t.co/OpWSBpGgAR pic.twitter.com/uupmJBQETG

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: @kupersimon说，以巴战争提醒我们任何多民族空间的脆弱性，在那里，对种族清洗的恐惧从未远离地表。
item.description:
The Israeli-Palestinian war reminds us of the fragility of any multi-ethnic space, where fears of ethnic cleansing are never far beneath the surface, says @kupersimon https://t.co/CS7zGo6MXG

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 意见：事实上，对许多工人来说，职称从来都不是小事，而令人不快的是，有迹象表明，事情正变得越来越棘手
item.description:
Opinion: The truth is that for many workers there has never been anything trivial about titles and, unhappily, there are signs that things are becoming trickier https://t.co/tQhfGdOhvD

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 意见：人力资源的失误是复杂的。即使是表面上看起来很好的想法，也往往会被赋予过多的分量，或者在采纳时没有充分考虑到背景情况
item.description:
Opinion: The failings of HR are complex. Even apparently good ideas often get too much weight placed on them, or may be adopted without giving enough thought to the context https://t.co/d4zAX4YNWh

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：微软已与法国人工智能初创公司 Mistral 达成协议，寻求扩大其在 OpenAI 之外的快速增长行业的参与度
item.description:
Breaking news: Microsoft has struck a deal with French artificial intelligence start-up Mistral as it seeks to broaden its involvement in the fast-growing industry beyond OpenAI https://t.co/fpt3xPGVIh pic.twitter.com/oi0PdPQlII

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 意见：加沙各地的死亡人数目前估计已超过 29 000 人，这足以令人震惊。但改变生命的受伤人数之多却令人震惊
item.description:
Opinion: The numbers of dead across Gaza, currently estimated at more than 29,000, are shocking enough. But the scale of life-changing injuries is utterly staggering https://t.co/8hJdB7yqKI pic.twitter.com/57Bt7aKcGX

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 早上好，纽约。当你还在睡觉时，我们阅读量最高的报道是：经济学家预测转折点到来，全球房价反弹
item.description:
Good morning, New York. While you were sleeping, our most read story was on Global house prices rebounding as economists predict a turning pointhttps://t.co/tFMQXEsRlQ

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：花旗集团聘请摩根大通顶级投资银行家维斯-拉加万（Vis Raghavan）为其新任银行业务主管，这是这家美国银行继去年重组后又一次重大招聘，以充实其高层管理团队。
item.description:
Breaking news: Citigroup has hired top JPMorgan investment banker Vis Raghavan to be its new head of banking, a major hire by the US bank which rounds out its top management team following a restructuring last year. https://t.co/OGpZh7z1m6 pic.twitter.com/hmig4wSUkR

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 长期以来，尼日利亚一直受到国际压力，要求它停止燃料补贴。但现在，许多人质疑尼日利亚在没有制定减震计划的情况下突然取消补贴是多么明智：
item.description:
Nigeria was long under international pressure to end fuel subsidies.

But now that it has, many are questioning how wise it was to abruptly eliminate the subsidies without a shock-absorbing plan: https://t.co/CGRlc8ye2Z pic.twitter.com/FdryobAYL4

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯正在掀起新一轮镇压不同声音的浪潮。虽然民意调查几乎没有反映出公众反对总统的迹象，但在一个由恐惧主导的政权中，这可能并不是一个可靠的指标。
item.description:
A new wave of repression against dissenting voices is taking place in Russia. While few signs of the public turning against the president are reflected in opinion polls, this may not be a reliable indicator in a regime dominated by fear https://t.co/VfpSrJIq9e pic.twitter.com/krEwPGWkR2

— Financial Times (@FT) February 26, 2024
